articles.author: Alastair Gale, Michael Heath
articles.title: Japan’s Defense Ambitions Boosted by Australia Navy Frigate Deal - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Japan’s Mitsubishi Heavy Industries won a multi-billion dollar deal to build a fleet of advanced naval frigates for Australia, boosting Tokyo’s ambitions to become a major exporter of military equipment and develop its defense sector.
